mapper.insert: insert into mybatis.AcctReconciliation (ReconciliationID, AvailableVol, TotalVolOfDistributorInTA, TransactionCfmDate, TotalFrozenVol, TASerialNO, TotalBackendLoad, ShareClass, DetailFlag, ShareRegisterDate, UndistributeMonetaryIncome, UndistributeMonetaryIncomeFlag, GuaranteedAmount, SourceType, FundCode, TAAccountID, TACode, DistributorCode,) values (#{ReconciliationID}, #{AvailableVol}, #{TotalVolOfDistributorInTA}, #{TransactionCfmDate}, #{TotalFrozenVol}, #{TASerialNO}, #{TotalBackendLoad}, #{ShareClass}, #{DetailFlag}, #{ShareRegisterDate}, #{UndistributeMonetaryIncome}, #{UndistributeMonetaryIncomeFlag}, #{GuaranteedAmount}, #{SourceType}, #{FundCode}, #{TAAccountID}, #{TACode}, #{DistributorCode})
mapper.update: update mybatis.AcctReconciliation set AvailableVol = #{AvailableVol}, TotalVolOfDistributorInTA = #{TotalVolOfDistributorInTA}, TransactionCfmDate = #{TransactionCfmDate}, TotalFrozenVol = #{TotalFrozenVol}, TASerialNO = #{TASerialNO}, TotalBackendLoad = #{TotalBackendLoad}, ShareClass = #{ShareClass}, DetailFlag = #{DetailFlag}, ShareRegisterDate = #{ShareRegisterDate}, UndistributeMonetaryIncome = #{UndistributeMonetaryIncome}, UndistributeMonetaryIncomeFlag = #{UndistributeMonetaryIncomeFlag}, GuaranteedAmount = #{GuaranteedAmount}, SourceType = #{SourceType}, FundCode = #{FundCode}, TAAccountID = #{TAAccountID}, TACode = #{TACode}, DistributorCode = #{DistributorCode} where TAAccountID = #{TAAccountID}
